item.title: The Data Evolution I â€” The Rise
item.description: Preface (of this series): It is well established today that data {Data is a general term I use for the spectrum of stats, data sci, ML and AI} is a function with an accelerating level of interest. For many there is difficulty in identifying what it means to them, and this is an important question to answer for anyone, whether you fall within this realm (data scientists, engineers, etc) or are outside of it (manager, marketer, etc).
